Clementine Moto

Air-Cooled Porsche Repair and Restoration

David Lee

David Lee is the man behind Clementine Bicycle Works, an original brand of bespoke carbon fiber bicycles. A former bike racer, David chases his passions and, at every turn in his career, builds his livelihood around the things that move him. Over the years, his love of collecting rare vintage motorcycles and classic cars has grown into a business of bringing them back to life. A masterful self-taught mechanic, his wheels (and wrenches) are always turning, and, in that way, Clementine has become a rolling chassis of custom designs, full restoration and repair services. David’s signature style, personality and artistry combined with his longtime love affair with air-cooled Porsches naturally led to Clementine Moto. Because he loves what he does, David goes full-gas every day. Get in, get on or get out of the way. When he’s not in the garage or paint booth, the Charleston native can be seen racing up the Ravenel Bridge on his Clementine bicycle or in his daily driver, an Aventurine Green 1996 993.

Some of Our Services


Maintain

We handle routine maintenance items such as oil changes, valve adjustments, tune-ups, and more.

Repair / Rebuild / Restore

In addition to routine repairs, we offer full engine / transmission rebuilds and full car restoration.

Modify

Lower, align, corner balance, track prep, cooling modifications - we can do it.
